options.title: --bind-address=ip_address
options.description: Use specified network interface to connect to MySQL Server

options.description: This option takes a comma-separated list of column names as its value

options.title: --columns=column_list, -c column_list
options.description: This option takes a comma-separated list of column names as its value

options.title: --compress, -C
options.description: Compress all information sent between client and server

options.title: --compress, -C
options.description: Compress all information sent between client and server

options.description: Permitted compression algorithms for connections to server

options.title: --debug[=debug_options], -# [debug_options]
options.description: Write debugging log

options.description: Print debugging information when program exits

options.title: --debug-info
options.description: Print debugging information, memory, and CPU statistics when program exits

options.title: --default-auth=plugin
options.description: Authentication plugin to use

options.title: --default-character-set=charset_name
options.description: Specify default character set

options.description: Read named option file in addition to usual option files

options.title: --defaults-file=file_name
options.description: Read only named option file

options.title: --defaults-group-suffix=str
options.description: Option group suffix value

options.description: Empty the table before importing the text file

options.description: Empty the table before importing the text file

options.description: Enable cleartext authentication plugin

options.description: This option has the same meaning as the corresponding clause for LOAD DATA

options.description: This option has the same meaning as the corresponding clause for LOAD DATA

options.description: Continue even if an SQL error occurs

options.description: Continue even if an SQL error occurs

options.description: See the description for the --replace option

options.description: Ignore the first N lines of the data file

options.description: This option has the same meaning as the corresponding clause for LOAD DATA

options.title: --local, -L
options.description: Read input files locally from the client host

options.title: --local, -L
options.description: Read input files locally from the client host

options.description: Lock all tables for writing before processing any text files

options.description: Lock all tables for writing before processing any text files

options.title: --login-path=name
options.description: Read login path options from .mylogin.cnf

options.title: --low-priority
options.description: Use LOW_PRIORITY when loading the table

options.title: --no-defaults
options.description: Read no option files

options.description: Password to use when connecting to server

options.description: Password to use when connecting to server

options.description: First multifactor authentication password to use when connecting to server

options.description: Second multifactor authentication password to use when connecting to server

options.description: Third multifactor authentication password to use when connecting to server

options.description: Connect to server using named pipe (Windows only)

options.description: Directory where plugins are installed

options.description: TCP/IP port number for connection

options.description: TCP/IP port number for connection

options.description: Print default options

options.title: --protocol={TCP|SOCKET|PIPE|MEMORY}
options.description: Transport protocol to use

options.description: The --replace and --ignore options control handling of input rows that duplicate existing rows on unique key values

options.description: The --replace and --ignore options control handling of input rows that duplicate existing rows on unique key values

options.title: --server-public-key-path=file_name
options.description: Path name to file containing RSA public key

options.description: Shared-memory name for shared-memory connections (Windows only)

options.description: Produce output only when errors occur

options.description: Produce output only when errors occur

options.description: File that contains list of trusted SSL Certificate Authorities

options.description: Directory that contains trusted SSL Certificate Authority certificate files

options.description: File that contains X.509 certificate

options.description: Permissible ciphers for connection encryption

options.description: File that contains certificate revocation lists

options.description: Directory that contains certificate revocation-list files

options.description: Whether to enable FIPS mode on client side

options.title: --ssl-key
options.description: File that contains X.509 key

options.title: --ssl-mode
options.description: Desired security state of connection to server

options.description: Permissible TLSv1.3 ciphersuites for encrypted connections

options.title: --tls-version=protocol_list
options.description: Permissible TLS protocols for encrypted connections

options.title: --use-threads=N
options.description: Number of threads for parallel file-loading

options.description: MySQL user name to use when connecting to server

options.description: MySQL user name to use when connecting to server

options.description: Verbose mode
